code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{startOfWeek}from'date-fns';import Header from'./components/Header';import AttendanceCalendar from'./components/AttendanceCalendar';import EmployeeManagement from'./components/EmployeeManagement';import Settings from'./components/Settings';import'./index.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[currentView,setCurrentView]=useState('calendar');const[selectedDate,setSelectedDate]=useState(startOfWeek(new Date(),{weekStartsOn:1}));const renderCurrentView=()=>{switch(currentView){case'calendar':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AttendanceCalendar,{selectedDate:selectedDate,onDateSelect:setSelectedDate});case'employees':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EmployeeManagement,{});case'settings':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Settings,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AttendanceCalendar,{selectedDate:selectedDate,onDateSelect:setSelectedDate});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{currentView:currentView,onViewChange:setCurrentView}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8",children:renderCurrentView()})]});};export default App;
